Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS_INS_SP" ( P_TABLE_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_PK_ID IN INTEGER, P_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_DESCRIPTION IN VARCHAR2, P_CREATED_BY IN INTEGER, P_ATTRIBUTE1 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, P_ATTRIBUTE2 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, P_ATTRIBUTE3 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, P_ATTRIBUTE4 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, P_ATTRIBUTE5 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL ) IS BEGIN INSERT INTO CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS ( ID, TABLE_NAME, PK_ID, LANGUAGE_CODE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5 ) SELECT CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS_S1.NEXTVAL, P_TABLE_NAME, P_PK_ID, L.LANGUAGE_CODE, P_NAME, P_DESCRIPTION, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, P_ATTRIBUTE1, P_ATTRIBUTE2, P_ATTRIBUTE3, P_ATTRIBUTE4, P_ATTRIBUTE5 FROM CMN_LANGUAGES L WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'CAPTION ALREADY EXISTS' FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS WHERE TABLE_NAME = P_TABLE_NAME AND PK_ID = P_PK_ID AND LANGUAGE_CODE = L.LANGUAGE_CODE); END;
